-- | Connections for TorXakis
--   
--   Connections for TorXakis
@package cnect
@version 0.1.7.0

module SocketWorld
openSockets :: IOS ()
closeSockets :: IOS ()

-- | putSocket : try to do output to world on time, or observe earlier
--   input (no quiescence)
putSocket :: Int -> Int -> EnvS -> Action -> IOC Action

-- | getSocket : observe input from world, or observe quiescence
getSocket :: Int -> EnvS -> IOC Action
